section.title: Textbook
section.p: We are using a free textbook written by David Diez, Mine Ã‡etinkaya-Rundel, Leah Dorazio, and Christopher D Barr. The book is called Advanced High School Statistics. (The authors originally wrote it for high school AP statistics courses, and chose this unfortunate name that might suggest it is not college level content. But it really is standard college level statistics.)

Access this book:
as a free HTML book at spot.pcc.edu/math/ahss/ed2.
in various PDF forms at www.openintro.org/book/ahss/.
for purchase from the PCC book store for $20.00. (PCC will ship it to you for free during the pandemic closure.)

Please note that there are some differences in the content between the HTML version of the book and the PDFs or printed copies. These differences are not important, but you may notice them if you use both versions to study.
